game.name: Space Engineers 2
game.genres: 액션, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Space Engineers 2 is a sandbox about engineering and colonization where you build ships, stations, and planetary bases in a fully destructible world. Begin the story of Miro and Ivan Sokol, expand humanity’s foothold in the Almagest system, and fight to survive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Space Engineers 2 is a sandbox about engineering and colonization where you build ships, stations, and planetary bases in a fully destructible world. Begin the story of Miro and Ivan Sokol, expand humanity’s foothold in the Almagest system, and fight to survive.

reviewHighlights.text: 와 드디어 행성, 서바이벌 나오면서 할만해졌네 넘 좋아
